title: How to Delete a Mii from Wii

steps.headline: Turn on the Wii.
steps.description: Go to Mii Channel by moving the cursor over the channel.

steps.headline: Move around the Mii Plaza.
steps.description: Find the Mii you want to delete.

steps.headline: Press 'A' over the Mii you want to delete.
steps.description: Press and hold 'B' to pick it up.

steps.headline: Drag the Mii to the Erase Mii option in the lower left corner.

text: Turn on the Wii. Go to Mii Channel by moving the cursor over the channel. Start Mii Channel. Wait for it to load. Move around the Mii Plaza. Find the Mii you want to delete. Press 'A' over the Mii you want to delete. Press and hold 'B' to pick it up. Drag the Mii to the Erase Mii option in the lower left corner. Drop it in the circle. Press "Erase". The Mii will be deleted.
